issue.title: Audit of topics to ensure no cheating allowed

content.raw:
I had forgotten that we also spawn valkyrie dynamically using the `gazebo_ros` API's, specifically the [spawn_model](https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/blob/indigo-devel/gazebo_ros/scripts/spawn_model) script, which uses:

* [model_states topic](https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/blob/kinetic-devel/gazebo_ros/scripts/spawn_model#L209)
* [gazebo_interface python library](https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/blob/kinetic-devel/gazebo_ros/scripts/spawn_model#L270-L271), which uses the [spawn_urdf_model service](https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/blob/kinetic-devel/gazebo_ros/src/gazebo_ros/gazebo_interface.py#L30)
